title: Peer Assessment-Based Online Course for Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design principles and experience in science education design
context.additional_context: Asynchronous collaboration design utilizing discussion boards and document-sharing features within an LMS.

learning_goals: Learners can improve the clarity and logical consistency of instructional design documents by 80% or more through peer assessment.
Learners can derive three types of feedback reflecting core dispositions of IDT experts (collaboration, problem-solving, critical thinking).
Learners can revise and refine an instructional design prototype two or more times based on peer assessment results to complete the final output.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
